name: mcp-educational-demo
description: Educational project demonstrating Model Context Protocol with multiple servers and an interactive client

scripts.servers: concurrently "npm run server:calculator" "npm run server:notes" "npm run server:templates" "npm run server:weather"
scripts.build: npm run build:servers && npm run build:client
scripts.build:servers: cd servers/calculator && npm run build && cd ../notes && npm run build && cd ../templates && npm run build && cd ../weather && npm run build
